name: Coronavirus (Gabrielrodriguez)
description: This COVID-19 styled game is just like the classic arcade game Asteroids but with a cure killing the virus. Use the mouse to target the virus and use the spacebar to move the needle around. to shoot at the virus, press or hold down  left click on the mouse. It's up to you to save the world from this coronavirus crisis! Try to take out as many viruses as you can!
